      • findAccount

        public static <any> findAccount(DAO sql,
                                boolean hierarchy,
                                OrgUnitBean orgUnit,
                                AccountBean account,
                                PwdCfgBean pwdCfgBean,
                                Paging paging)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a Beanlist containing the accounts that are associated to the configuration given. It is possible to filter by organization unit and account. The hierarchy boolean flag is used to specify if the search of accounts must also include the children of the organization unit given or not. The hieararchy and orgUnit filters are used only if it is provided an account filter which is in Matched state (0), otherwise they are simply ignored.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        hierarchy - boolean flag used to specify if the search must also include the children of the organization unit given or not.
        orgUnit - organization unit filter
        account - account filter
        pwdCfgBean - configuration filter, mandatory and defined uniquely
        Returns:
        list of properties found
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • findTarget

        public static <any> findTarget(DAO sql,
                               TargetBean targetBean,
                               PwdCfgBean pwdCfgBean,
                               Paging paging)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a Beanlist containing the targets that are associated to the configuration given.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        targetBean - target filter
        pwdCfgBean - configuration filter
        paging -
        Returns:
        list of targets found
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
